About

Hola! I'm Felisa! I'm an undergrad student working at Lab25.

My main fields of interest are Cognitive Psychology and Neuroscience, specially in terms of the study of Perception. I'm currently working on my thesis on Signal Detection Theory. Other subjects of interest for me are psychophysics, psychometricts, evolutionary psychology and cognitive development.
